means: 使熟练( perfect的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I removed the fibroid tumours, using the techniques that I have perfected.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用完善后的技术摘掉了纤维瘤。

sentence.Network_en: The army had perfected the use of terror as a means of controlling the population.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队已经深谙利用恐怖手段控制民众之道。

sentence.Network_en: -- Measures for preventing and controlling industrial pollution have gradually been perfected.
sentence.Network_cn: -- 工业污染防治措施逐步完善.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Man , when perfected , is the best of animals ., 人在达到完美境界时是最优秀的动物.
grace is but glory begun and glory is but grace perfected .风度是光荣的开始，光荣是风度的完美形式。
from the long run , the tax system of the turnover tax should be perfected and the system of the tax of the stock exchange and stamp tax should be implemented .从长远来看，我国应逐步完善证券流转税制，实行证券交易税和印花税兼征制度。
When abstention from theft is perfected , the yogi can have whatever he desires ., 当偷窃的观念消除而趋于完美时 , 修持者将获得满足.

list.abs: 21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... dissatisfaction n. 不满 perfection n. 完美；完善 disappoint vt. 使失望.
《Friends》词汇表A ... letting n. 出租 perfection n. 尽善尽美, 完美, 完成 loathe vt. 厌恶, 憎恶.
...肥健身视频完美减肥产品瘦出完美身形美丽无法阻挡完美(PERFECT)的产品可以减肥吗? 高纤餐和。
个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... participate in 参加 perfect 使完善；改善 perform 执行，履行.

entry.def: Something that is perfect is as good as it could possibly be.

example.ex: Hiring a nanny has turned out to be the perfect solution...
example.tran: 雇用保姆结果成了解决问题的最佳方法。

entry.def: If you say that something is perfect for a particular person, thing, or activity, you are emphasizing that it is very suitable for them or for that activity.

example.ex: Carpet tiles are perfect for kitchens because they're easy to take up and wash...
example.tran: 方块地毯非常适用于厨房，因为其便于揭起来清洗。

example.ex: So this could be the perfect time to buy a home.
example.tran: 所以这可能是买房子的绝佳时机。

entry.tran: 无瑕的；完好的；完美无缺的
entry.def: If an object or surface is perfect, it does not have any marks on it, or does not have any lumps, hollows, or cracks in it.

example.ex: Use only clean, Grade A, perfect eggs.
example.tran: 只用表面干净、无磕碰的A级鸡蛋。

entry.def: You can use perfect to give emphasis to the noun following it.

example.ex: Some people are always coming up to perfect strangers and asking them what they do...
example.tran: 有些人总爱和完全不认识的人搭讪，询问人家的职业。

entry.def: If you perfect something, you improve it so that it becomes as good as it can possibly be.

example.ex: We perfected a hand-signal system so that he could keep me informed of hazards...
example.tran: 我们完善了一套手势信号，这样他就能随时告知我什么时候有危险了。

example.ex: I removed the fibroid tumours, using the techniques that I have perfected.
example.tran: 我用完善后的技术摘掉了纤维瘤。

entry.def: The perfect tenses of a verb are the ones used to talk about things that happened or began before a particular time, as in 'He's already left' and 'They had always liked her'. The present perfect tense is sometimes called the perfect tense.

sentences.sentence: "a graceful but not yet fully perfected literary style"

auth_sentence.content: Knee implants were largely perfected a quarter century ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: Knee implants were largely perfected a quarter century ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Knee implants were largely perfected a quarter century ago.

auth_sentence.content: I know my country has not perfected itself.
auth_sentence.res_content: I know my country has not perfected itself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I know my country has not perfected itself.

auth_sentence.content: Stokharin has perfected a painless death by poison.
auth_sentence.res_content: Stokharin has perfected a painless death by poison.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stokharin has perfected a painless death by poison.
